Detailed Description

Information you can retrieve about a particular security permission known to the system.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::core::PermissionInfo::PROTECTION_LEVEL

protection level.

Enumerator:
PROTECTION_NORMAL 

A normal application value for getProtectionLevel().

PROTECTION_DANGEROUS 

Dangerous value for getProtectionLevel().

PROTECTION_SIGNATURE 

System-level value for getProtectionLevel().

PROTECTION_SIGNATURE_OR_SYSTEM 

System-level value for getProtectionLevel().

static PermissionInfo* gaia::core::PermissionInfo::createFromParcelN ( const Parcel &  in) [static]

Create a new instance of the Parcelable class.

Parameters:
inThe Parcel to read the object's data from.
Returns:
Returns a new instance of the Parcelable class. And PermissionInfo pointer need to be released after used.
int32_t gaia::core::PermissionInfo::getDescriptionRes ( ) const

A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's description.

From the "description" attribute or, if not set, 0.

base::String gaia::core::PermissionInfo::getPermissionGroup ( ) const

Get the name of permissionGroup attribute.

int32_t gaia::core::PermissionInfo::getProtectionLevel ( ) const

The level of access this permission is protecting.

Values may be PROTECTION_NORMAL, PROTECTION_DANGEROUS, PROTECTION_SIGNATURE, PROTECTION_SIGNATURE_OR_SYSTEM.

base::String gaia::core::PermissionInfo::loadDescription ( const PackageManager &  pm) const

Retrieve the textual description of this permission.

Parameters:
pmA PackageManager from which the description can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Returns:
Returns a String containing the permission's description. If there is no description, empty is returned.
